qas.question: Where did Barcelona defeat Real Madrid for a trophy win in 2005-06?
What was the winning score for the game with Real Madrid at Bernabeu stadium?
How many wins did Frank Rijkaard have at Bernabeu Stadium?
What recognition did Ronaldinho's second goal receive at Bernabeu?
What team did Barcelona defeat to win the Champions League trophy?

context: In the 2005–06 season, Barcelona repeated their league and Supercup successes. The pinnacle of the league season arrived at the <a0_0>Santiago Bernabéu Stadium<a0_0/> in a <a1_0>3–0<a1_0/> win over Real Madrid. It was Frank Rijkaard's <a2_0>second victory<a2_0/> at the Bernabéu, making him the first Barcelona manager to win there twice. Ronaldinho's performance was so impressive that after his second goal, which was Barcelona's third, some Real Madrid fans gave him a <a3_0>standing ovation<a3_0/>. In the Champions League, Barcelona beat the English club <a4_0>Arsenal<a4_0/> in the final. Trailing 1–0 to a 10-man Arsenal and with less than 15 minutes remaining, they came back to win 2–1, with substitute Henrik Larsson, in his final appearance for the club, setting up goals for Samuel Eto'o and fellow substitute Juliano Belletti, for the club's first European Cup victory in 14 years.
